titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the John A. Wilkinson, Secretary of Yale University, Records
Wilkinson (John A.), Secretary of Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 11:27

did.unittitle: John A. Wilkinson, secretary of Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of memoranda, minutes, agendas, correspondence, speeches, organizational charts, reports, log books, and general administrative records concerning Yale's buildings and grounds, committees, departments, programs, residential colleges, policies, ethical concerns, and financial matters during John A. Wilkinson's tenure as secretary.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Office of the Secretary

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 4-A (YRG 4-A), Records of the Yale secretary's office.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is partially restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: John A. Wilkinson, Secretary of Yale University, Records (RU 68). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of memoranda, minutes, agendas, correspondence, speeches, organizational charts, reports, log books, and general administrative records concerning Yale's buildings and grounds, committees, departments, programs, residential colleges, policies, ethical concerns, and financial matters during John A. Wilkinson's tenure as secretary.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

controlaccess.subject: Universities and colleges -- Administration
controlaccess.corpname: Yale University. Office of the Secretary
